Text: Btw, the difference from the other torrent(s) with the "complete" soundtrack, is that this REALLY is complete (both w and w/i DJ:s, ambience, police radio etc.), and has slightly higher quality.

I use Batch processing in WaveLab (find it here on TPB). That way you can select all files, or all folders you want to convert and specify the output format to almost anything.

Great job. This is fantastic post. Just a suggestion but in the future if you just post the torrent as individual files or at the very least as individual station .rars you wouldn't need to post individual torrents. With uTorrent and I'm sure you can do this with others, you can select as little or as much of a torrent you want to download.

Also to those of you who are using MP3 players and needed to convert, try using Mediamonkey. You can use it to sync your player plus automatically convert the file to mp3 as it goes to the player.

Hang on, everyone:
First of all, these files are the RIP of the GTA:SA compatible tracks. THESE FILES ARE NOT COMPATIBLE WITH GTA:SA. If your copy didn't come with the radio stations, I suggest finding a complete copy on tpb. if you do not know how to turn on your radio, press 'R' or 'Insert' to turn on radio, and change stations.
